basics.name: Reza Babaei
basics.label: Senior React Native Engineer
basics.summary: Senior React Native Engineer with 8+ years building high-performance mobile platforms in React Native/TypeScript. Expert in native module development (Java/Swift/Obj-C), offline-first architecture, and mobile performance optimization. Proven impact reducing latency, memory usage, and sync failures in production apps serving mission-critical environments. Strong background in cloud infrastructure, CI/CD, and automated testing.
